title: Aloo Sabzi (Simple Potato Curry)
text: Aloo Sabzi: Heat oil, add cumin, add chopped onions and sauté until translucent. Add chopped potatoes and tomatoes, turmeric, salt, and a cup of water. Simmer until potatoes are cooked. Garnish with coriander.

title: Jeera Rice
text: Jeera Rice: Rinse rice and soak 20 minutes. Heat ghee, add cumin seeds. Add drained rice, salt and water. Cook until done. Fluff with fork.

title: Masoor Dal Tadka
text: Masoor Dal: Pressure cook masoor dal with turmeric. Make tadka with oil, cumin, garlic, onions and tomatoes. Mix cooked dal and simmer. Garnish with coriander.

title: Paneer Bhurji
text: Paneer Bhurji: Crumble paneer. Sauté onion, green chili; add tomato and spices. Add paneer and stir-fry for 2-3 minutes. Serve hot.

title: Vegetable Upma
text: Upma: Roast semolina. Make tadka with mustard, urad dal, curry leaves. Add chopped vegetables and water. Stir in semolina till cooked.

title: Chana Masala (Quick)
text: Cook chickpeas. Sauté onions and tomatoes, add spices, add chickpeas and simmer. Garnish with coriander.

title: Spinach Dal
text: Cook moong dal with turmeric. Blanch spinach and blend. Combine dal and spinach, make tadka with garlic and cumin.

title: Egg Bhurji
text: Scramble eggs; sauté onion and tomato, add spices, add eggs and cook till done.

title: Aloo Paratha Filling
text: Boiled mashed potatoes mixed with spices to be used as paratha filling.

title: Tomato Rasam
text: Prepare tamarind water; cook tomatoes, add spices and tamarind; finish with tempering and coriander.
